Sentencas: Full commercialisation of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology is limited by technological challenges, in particular due to the thermomechanical reliability of the components.
Titulo: 3D CFD/FEM analysis of thermomechanical long-term behaviour in SOFCs: Furnace operation with different fuel gases

Sentencas: The long-term thermomechanical behaviour is especially affected by the operation environment.
Titulo: 3D CFD/FEM analysis of thermomechanical long-term behaviour in SOFCs: Furnace operation with different fuel gases

Sentencas: Most of the research and development studies, as well as laboratory studies are performed within furnaces rather than operating in a real system environment.
Titulo: 3D CFD/FEM analysis of thermomechanical long-term behaviour in SOFCs: Furnace operation with different fuel gases

Sentencas: However, the thermomechanical response of fuel cells operating in the furnace, especially operating with different fuel gas compositions is not fully understood, yet.
Titulo: 3D CFD/FEM analysis of thermomechanical long-term behaviour in SOFCs: Furnace operation with different fuel gases

Sentencas: The present study investigates the thermomechanical comparison of H-2, 77% CH4 and 38% CH4 operation.
Titulo: 3D CFD/FEM analysis of thermomechanical long-term behaviour in SOFCs: Furnace operation with different fuel gases

Sentencas: A three dimensional coupled CFD/FEM sub-model, derived from a whole stack model and experimentally determined data is used.

Sentencas: The analyses account both for the thermo fluid flow and the nonlinear elastoplastic, creep strain material behaviour.

Sentencas: The thermomechanical behavior of the most favourable operation condition has been analysed for 1200 h operation time.

Sentencas: The results are validated qualitatively and quantitatively using postmortem images and creep strain data, respectively.
